# coder reset-password

Directly connect to the database to reset a user's password

## Usage

```console
coder reset-password <username> [flags]
```

## Flags

### --postgres-url

URL of a PostgreSQL database to connect to.
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Consumes | <code>$CODER_PG_CONNECTION_URL</code> |
